00049 class QicsGridStyle: public QicsStyle
00050 {
00051 public:
00058     enum QicsGridStyleProperty { HorizontalGridLinesVisible,
00059                  VerticalGridLinesVisible,
00060                  HorizontalGridLineWidth,
00061                  VerticalGridLineWidth,
00062                  HorizontalGridLineStyle,
00063                  VerticalGridLineStyle,
00064                  HorizontalGridLinePen,
00065                  VerticalGridLinePen,
00066                  GridCellClipping,
00067                  DrawPartialCells,
00068                  AllowUserResize,
00069                  AllowUserMove,
00070                  ClickToEdit,
00071                  AutoSelectCellContents,
00072                  EnterTraversalDirection,
00073                  TabTraversalDirection,
00074                  GridRepaintBehavior,
00075                  CellOverflowBehavior,
00076                  MaxOverflowCells,
00077                  CurrentCellStyle,
00078                  CurrentCellBorderWidth,
00079                  FrameLineWidth,
00080                  FrameStyle,
00081                  GridPalette,
00082                  Viewport,
00083                  MoreTextPixmap,
00084                  DragEnabled,
00085                  LastProperty };
00086 
00087         
00091     QicsGridStyle(QicsGridType type, bool create_defaults = false,
00092           QWidget *template_widget = 0);
00093        
00097     inline void *getValue(QicsGridStyleProperty name) const
00098     { return QicsStyle::getValue((int)name); }
00102     inline void setValue(QicsGridStyleProperty name, const void *val) 
00103     { QicsStyle::setValue((int) name, val); }
00104 
00109     inline void clear(QicsGridStyleProperty prop)
00110     { QicsStyle::clear((int) prop); }
00111 
00112 protected:        
00119     static const QicsStylePropertyType myGridStyleTypeList[];
00120 };
